name: Cloud Peak
description: This is a game I helped create with a team of 2, we created this game for the course game design. The project was aimed to create our own game out of a set of of restrictions. From that we created the game called Cloud Peak, it is a dungeon crawler rouge lite game. In a similair vain to the game Darkest Dungeon. The game was created with Unity and C#. This was the first game I created, I learned a tremendouss amount from this project. I learned a lot about game design and game development from this project.

name: Knife crime for industry project
description: This project was a collaboration between us and a Fontys partner for the course of Game Design. We created the game with a group of 12 where I lead the level design team. This team consisted of 3 level designers. The game was created in Unity with c#. The game is a narrative game that follows the story of a young adult who is a purpetrator of a knife crime. The game was created in 10 weeks. I enjoyed working on this project and I am proud of the result. I also learned a lot about game design and game development from this project.

name: Help roby for PIT Tilburg
description: This project was created for my first attempt on the internship, I together with a fellow student of Fontys tried to tackle a problem that a teacher at PIT faced. I did not see the end of this project due to personal reasons. When I was working on the project I mostly created the Idea behind the game and the level design. I worked on creating an AI that would be able to reconize lego structures that would be the solution to the puzzle. It was a fun project to work on and I learned a lot from it.

name: Escape Room VR Project for Practoraat Interactieve Technologie (A.K.A PIT) Tilburg
description: This project was a collaboration between Fontys University of Applied Sciences and the Practoraat Interactieve Technologie (A.K.A PIT) Tilburg. The goal of the project was to create a prototype of a game that would be used in a classroom setting. The game was created in Unity VR with c#. I was responsible for the overall game design and the level design. The game was created in 20 weeks. The game is in still extremely early stages of development and is not playable yet. It became a VR escape room type puzzle game. Where the player solved puzzles to strengthen their skills in the field of Schoonheids Specialiste. To reconize certain skin conditions and be able to link them to a discription. I am proud of the result and I am looking forward to see the game come to life.

name: Voidscape
description: This is a game I helped create with a team of 4 other people. I was responsible for a few features of the game. Namely the AI, Boost mechanic, enemy outpost level section, interactables system and the comet that launches at the player. I also helped with the level design and the overall game design. The game was created in Godot with a mix of C# and GDscript. We were aided by a intern of Sint Lucas who created a lot of the art in the game. The game took shape in 20 weeks, the version show below in the trailer is made in 10 weeks. I enjoyed working on this project and I am proud of the result. I also learned a lot about game design and game development from this project. The team I worked with created a studio that is called RedByte Studios, where we plan to create more games in the future.
